title: owning every skin in the game!
body:
Okay so I've done some research and there is a few of us around which are dedicated skin collectors, I'm unsure about the Oceania servers but I know in Northern American servers there's a few people who own all the skins within the game at least to an extend that are purchasable or still available to get.

I myself have been playing since the end of season 2 NA server abd transfered ovee to OCE when it became available.
I have been collecting skins ever since the massive legacy bundles came out, I have reached 510 skins so far and have 41 skins left to buy.

Of course I have missed out of a few skins here and there like the season 1 skins and also S1/S2 ranked skins, which is a shame but I guess that's nothing someone can fix unless you bought an account with them skins the restarted your collection.

A lot of people have ridiculed me and abused me for my excessive amounts of money I have placed into this game, but logically it's no different to them gambling their money or buying console games or spending it clubbing etc.
each to their own!

I enjoy being a collector and enjoy spending money on thing I love.
anyways u have come to spend a whopping $3000 dollars over the years on league of legends which I can't say I'm overly proud of but can't say I'm not impressed either.

The point of this post is to basically open people's eyes that it's people like myself and a few others which spend their money they earn to keep games like this free!
I don't ask for appreciation or to be applaud of my contributions, I ask not to be abused or insulted over my life choices and what I enjoy.

Anyways! My goal is to own all the buy able skins by mid thus year! I'm slowly buying the last of the 41 as they go on sale, and purchasing the new skins as they are released.

Support me or not but I'm emitting what I do and am having fun while doing it!

replies.body:
I understand it's a hobby or w/e.

But what is the point in owning that many skins?
Some people are collector; they pay money for full collections.
so he can realise that if his account gets hacked, he will have nothing
it is the biggest waste of money lmao

An old account of mine had almost every skin (Minus the promotional PAX, Championship and Ranked skins) back in 2012 which i spent a considerable amount on. This trait has also followed me onto this account. I have no clue how many skins i own at the moment but i've spent atleast $3500+ on this Account and atleast $7000 in total over all of my League accounts.

It's a very difficult thing to break :D
plees misteri gift meh. me only had one grain of rice today to support me famiry

I'm up to 295 skins now. Same as above I enjoy collecting them, and having the freedom to pick whatever skin I want for a given game.

I track my collection [here ](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15ynwbqRMqxrN8Lvr_BQb2sc1gzCCVmWwC5KQAZHfLFk/edit?usp=sharing)(as rito doesn't provide any option to do this in the client)

Skins in green are 490 Mystery Gifts and the yellow ones are the ~790 (or however much they were). Feel free to use my sheet as a template for your own collection.
Im sorry, but i can't handle owning more then one skin for the same champion, i'd prefer to just have one so i don't feel like i waste one skin by not playing it, but if you have the money..
